summary.para: Selects elements either from ATensor or BTensor, depending on the value of the corresponding element in ConditionTensor. Non-zero elements of ConditionTensor select from ATensor, while zero-valued elements select from BTensor.
summary.code: f(cond, a, b) = a, if cond != 0 b, otherwise Example: [[1, 0], [1, 1]] // ConditionTensor [[1, 2], [3, 4]] // ATensor [[9, 8], [7, 6]] // BTensor [[1, 8], [3, 4]] // Output

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IF_OPERATOR_DESC.ConditionTensor
member.summary: The condition tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IF_OPERATOR_DESC.ATensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the left-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IF_OPERATOR_DESC.BTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the right-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IF_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
